page.title: 09HOME LIFE PAISLEY
page.content: { A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LAURA I got out of bed at 8a.m. and was dressed and in school uniform by 8.10. a.m. In 5 minutes I was washed and had brushed my teeth.I put out my Corn Flakes,ate them and drank my tea. I then brushed my hair which I had washed the night before,and was a little damp.I put my trainers and coat on, picked up my school-bag and left the house a 8.45a.m. The school bell rang at 9a.m.In the classroom we said the Lord's Prayer and then did {mental arithmetic,} practised our tables and were asked them by the teacher.We wrote some sums in our jotters. Playtime at 10.40.After that until lunch at 12.10 we did Let's Make Maps.In the afternoon we did some language work.Home time was at 3.30.I went to my Gran's then home for tea.
